creator: naveen_kanuganti@infosys.com
text:
Hi Team 

We are using Jmeter 2.11 for recording the Java web start application ( .jnlp) , in which we are able to record some requests successfully and for other subsequent requests we are getting
the below errors in response 

“org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException: XML parse error”

“Missing tika-app.jar in classpath. Unable to convert to plain text this kind of document.
Download the tika-app-x.x.jar file from http://tika.apache.org/download.html
And put the file in <JMeter>/lib directory.”

As per the above response we have downloaded tika-app-1.6 jar file from website , placed it in <Jmeter>  lib directory and restarted the Jmeter. But still the error is not resolved.

It would be really helpful if someone can provide pointers to sort out this error.

Thanks
Naveen

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask on JMeter User Mailing List.
